alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradford County through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starke, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Beasley, New River, Sampson, Lawtey and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
